name: Olmisoft
overview:
Olmisoft has been operating on the software development outsourcing market for over nine years and has completed hundreds of projects (some of which over a thousand hours) for various industries and business spheres. The projects we created, involved using most of the technologies widely used to create complex software, web applications and websites, which comply with all the modern standards.

We deliver full development cycle starting from requirement gathering through to quality assurance and maintenance services. That makes me confident that Olmisoft can deliver a project that will comply with all the requirements you outlined in your request and our services will meet or exceed all the expectations you have for your development service provider.
